amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill rules that are necessary to prevent an imminent threat to health or safety or other emergency.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 233 (Roll no. 581).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 233 (Roll no. 581).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Conyers.
